head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths AGRY, NANCY V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths AGRY, NANCY V.

block.p: AGRY-Nancy V. Suddenly, on September 14. Survived by husband Warren Agry of Greenwich, CT, son Bradford W. Agry, of New York, brother Peter A. Vogt of Lake View, NY, as well as four nieces and two nephews. A memorial mass will be celebrated at Saint Michael Church, 469 North Street, Greenwich, CT on Tuesday, September 19th at 10AM with the Reverend Michael R. Moynihan officiating. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to Middlebury College (VT), or Saint Michael Church.
